website_summaries.verdict: A handful of wearers agreed that the New Balance 1400 v6 is a dependable shoe for daily walking and running sessions. Although some of them have problems with its thick insole and reflective details, others still lauded the shoe's perfect fit and performance. Overall, the footwear is a good option for those who are looking for a comfortable and flexible footwear.
pros: The shoe is comfortable to use especially when running and walking, according to some buyers
Its lightweight feature was admired by a lot of testers
Reviewers said that the flexible upper part of the shoes wraps the foot evenly
Some users noted that the New Balance 1400 v6 leaves no rubbing spots
It prevents hurtful feelings on the foot
A significant number of consumers agreed that the fit was excellent
cons: The insole of the shoe is too thick, based on one review
Some wearers commented that the back part of the shoe lacks the capability of being reflective

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight racing flat at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These have been a regular racing flat for me for a little over a year. They’re super light with a mesh upper that is extremely breathable and still durable. I always blow out the uppers on my trail shoes but I’ve not had an issue with these. You really can’t go wrong with these for up tempo track work or faster races from the mile up to a half/full marathon.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary M.

customer_reviews.title: soles falling off after a month
customer_reviews.text: New Balance is not what is used to be. This is the 2nd pair of NB shoes that have the soles coming unglued. The first pair 125.00 pair lasted 6 months. This 100.00 pair only 1 month. I have had to cut chunks of the sole off because it was flapping and tripping my son. I used to be a New Balance customer almost exclusively. Now, not so much. They have lost my trust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hope this is just a one off.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these sneakers. I’ve ONLY been buying New Balance for a few years now. However, I bought these in May. Only wear them to the store and such. Nothing heavy. Not even a work out in them.... and I realized last night that my right sole is peeling off. Not gonna lie.... it sort of made me sick to my stomach because these shoes are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Rippee

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Lightweight Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This model is my main shoe: for running, racing, walking, even for work in the warehouse. It's very comfortable and about as lightweight as wearing nothing. I think both shoes together weigh about 1 lb.
customer_reviews.author: Ron A

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Insanely narrow. Slightly wider than a woman's size 5.5 slide on shoe. 2E more like Lady. My feet hang over the edges. It's a cool looking racer but you can't really vouch on quality via looks alone on a true running shoe. The search continues.
customer_reviews.author: jY

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart before their two week birthday.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the gym. Loved the shoes except they started falling apart before I had them for two weeks. Great fit, quality not worth the price. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: summer1999

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe, shoddy workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest, the quality was lacking the shoes were falling apart after a month of running. New Balance replaced the shoes after I complained and the new ones are comfy but after a few months I can see my sock on the shoe. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: MR. RUNNER MAN

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is flimsey and offers no support. Much better shoes on market. Save your money dont get ripped off like I did. Not even sure its real brand name.
customer_reviews.author: edgonz456

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great, lightweight shoe. Saw some immediate improve in my pace. Feels 1/2 size small, but no real issues so far. Only downside is it might not last very long for everyday use given how light/sparse the materials are. Tread seems like it’s good for maybe 6 months of road running.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: WOW these are light
customer_reviews.text: They shave weight by thinning out the tongue. Probably other materials. I used them just for elliptical. I really like the feel of them on my feet. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hollins

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER LIGHT AND COMFY! Ran a mile 1.5 miles with these today in 9 min 25 seconds and hit my mile mark at 6 min 7 seconds! THEN, 50 yard dash in 6.8 seconds! I am a HIIT training type of person so I’m always using my CrossFit metcon 2’s that are 11.5 ounces. These are 7 ounces which felt like feathers! Hence, my very proud time’s I just hit today!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Super light, Comfortable, Running Barefoot
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I just began running (read super slow) and wanted a shoe that was super lite that I could run in barefoot, this is that shoe. The inside has no imperfections fits like a glove, and is so comfortable. I run 3-4 times a week and the shoe is great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE SOVAY

customer_reviews.title: As good as or better than any series 1400's I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 1400 fan since my first pair of V2s. Love these. Light, well built. Better with Lock Laces. Zero complaints. Know they are ultra-light shoes and will wear out for most folks quicker than heavier shoes, but that's generally the price for racing shoes. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Tate

customer_reviews.title: On par with other review - sole peeling off after less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a month. Usually run 4-6 miles everyday. These have been my change up shoes so I haven't worn them everyday. Realized today the sole is starting to peel off. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware Surprise Design Detail
customer_reviews.text: WTF? Hot pink lace tips? Notice lace tips are not shown in product photos. Pretty sure I would have gone back to the internet blackhole of research had I seen this prior to purchase. Apparently, I am not confident enough to wear a color like this. Gonna have to replace laces. I actually imagine the shoe itself will be great as always with NB but jeez. Edit: After friends quit laughing they suggested magic marker, Duh!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL R.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair. Great Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love these for running at the gym and everyday use. Very light, responsive and comfortable. My 2nd pair!
customer_reviews.author: Cogmastax

customer_reviews.title: Love These Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are awesome. The pictures are pretty accurate to how they look when you get them. The color pops just enough where its not screaming but you can see it well. The sneakers are light and very comfortable. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and really comfortable. They are so light it’s like I’m not wearing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Evan M Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Worn Out after wearing them 5 times!
customer_reviews.text: Have walked 40miles in the past couple weeks and the wear and tear represent 400miles! Find the shoes very comfortable, however, I expected much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: User 85

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: After receiving these 11 days ago, the soles are peeling. barely worn as you can see from the soles. Disappointing because I love New Balance. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Keleigh

customer_reviews.title: waay to small
customer_reviews.text: although the shoe also doesn't feel right for some reason and returned it
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Wore out just after running for 1 months. The fabric underneath is very thin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great nice lightweight track shoe. Will definitely buy again next track season
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoe it was so light. I wear it for the gym, and it's so comfortable. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Saud Tareq Buqais

customer_reviews.title: Sole started peeling after about 35 miles
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. After only about 35 miles in these the sole started peeling as you can see in the photo. I run a 5k about 5 days a week on road and paved paths. The fit was fine and they are light weight but obviously not that durable.
customer_reviews.author: James Q

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and grippy
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. NB usually runs a touch narrow and so do these. Perfect fit for not quite a narrow not quite regular guy
customer_reviews.author: hc

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight & Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great for running. First Day of use and they hardly feel stiff! Very light and comfortable fit! New Balance is the shoe to have!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great minimalist running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe. Very light and minimalist shoe. I’ve put over 100 miles on them since January while training for a half and full marathon.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIAN CASCIOLA

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again. Great for Marathons.
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable shoes! Minimal break-in period required. I’ve owned two pairs of them for the two full marathons that I’ve done and they have made a huge difference for me, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for running. Fits great and no blisters from rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: OmegasWeapon

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes have pink end cap laces which doesn’t show that in the picture and these run far too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were not new and and were missing insoles.
customer_reviews.text: These clearly aren’t new. There were no insoles in the shoes that were provided. There are odd scratches on the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoe I have found
customer_reviews.text: Been running with these since the 1400v3 came out. Best running shoe for me hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Longdon IV

customer_reviews.title: Good snug fit, works well on the treadmill
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove, cushioning could be better but I got them for the treadmill so it’s not a concern. Only had them a week but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Pounds

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Outsole fell apart after 5 runs, one day after return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Still a good choice!
customer_reviews.text: Have had the past three versions of these. Still like the lightness of the V6 but I don’t like the tounge, or lack there of. The ultra minimalist tounge is the weak point in these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very soft for how light they are! Nice fit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Scott

customer_reviews.title: I put a lot of miles on mine
customer_reviews.text: I see some negative reviews out there, a lot noting the sole coming off. I've run these puppies into the ground and put way more miles on them than i probably should have. I have to assume well over 500 miles by this point. I think the light nature of them helped me stengthen my foot. I've had too much padding in the last and gotten myself into some planter issues. I'll give another set a go and see how they hold up as well and see if I got lucky with the last ones or there were just a few unlucky ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew George

customer_reviews.title: good general fitness shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the shoes for running on the treadmill and for home gym general fitness exercise. They fit as expected, are very lightweight and offer enough support for 3 miles on the treadmill. Satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: blackfeetman

customer_reviews.title: Great for serious runners
customer_reviews.text: Most of these negative reviews are from people who didn't understand what they were buying. These are for people who do not need cushion in their soles because they run with correct form -- on the balls of your feet. You can run a marathon in these. I've probably put 12 months x 4 miles/day on these. They are also awesome for cross training, cross fit etc.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Williams

customer_reviews.title: Traction feels different at first
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. Lightweight and flexible. The tread feels a little aggressive at first. The tread on the fore foot is made up of triangular lugs and gives it a squishy feel campaired to smoother patterns. Broke in / got used to it, but felt odd at first.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honor the product specs.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked nice, but I ordered a size 12 men’s shoes and I received a shoes that seemed to be women’s size 7 or 8. I could not tell, because the shoes had no inside labels, which I found interesting. They were advertised as new shoes. I returned them right away. Pity, they are some of my favorite flats.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes Watch Size
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great right out of the box, the shoes are narrow so either try one size up or a 2E. I did the try before you buy program and I got the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: michael nelson

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 1400v6 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Fast. Aggressive. Lightweight. The New Balance 1400 series delivers that, and more, with the 1400v6 mens racing flat. Featuring the same REVlite bottom unit as its predecessor, this updated version features a lightweight upper thats fit wherever your route takes you. Plus, a FantomFit support cage delivers a secure midfoot fit, while a breathable mesh helps you keep comfortable mile after mile.
